description: This Java class 'PojoNativeCodeProducer' is responsible for generating native C header and source files for POJO (Plain Old Java Object) structures, including enums, encode/decode functions, create/destroy functions, and getters/setters, based on Java wrappers and templates. It utilizes code templates and processes Java wrappers to produce corresponding C code for inter-language interoperability.

classes.name: PojoNativeCodeProducer
classes.description: This class generates C code for native POJOs based on Java wrapper definitions, including header/source files, typedefs, function prototypes, and implementations for create, destroy, encode, decode, and getter/setter functions, tailored for native inter-language operations.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method to generate native code (header and source files) from the context and language mask.

methods.name: generateWrapperFile
methods.description: Generation of wrapper files is not applicable for native code, returns false.

methods.name: generateWrapperBuffer
methods.description: Returns null as not applicable, since specific methods generate sections.

methods.name: generateNativeHeaderFile
methods.description: Creates the C header file containing enum definitions, typedefs for POJOs, and function prototypes, returning the include filename.

methods.name: generateNativeSourceFile
methods.description: Creates the C source file implementing the functions declared in the header.

methods.name: generateNativePojoDefs
methods.description: Generates typedefs for POJO structures to include in the header.

methods.name: generateNativePojoFunction
methods.description: Generates encode/decode and create/destroy functions for POJOs, either prototypes or full implementations.

methods.name: generateNativeEncode
methods.description: Creates the encoding function (prototype or full) for a given variable.

methods.name: generateNativeDecode
methods.description: Creates the decoding function (prototype or full) for a given variable.

methods.name: generateNativeCreate
methods.description: Creates the constructor function (prototype or full) for a given POJO variable.

methods.name: generateNativeDestroy
methods.description: Creates the destructor function (prototype or full) for a given POJO variable.

methods.name: generateNativeListDestroy
methods.description: Creates the function for destroying POJO instances in a list.

methods.name: generateNativeMapDestroy
methods.description: Creates the function for destroying POJO instances in a map.

methods.name: generateNativeGetters
methods.description: Generates getter functions for array and map variables.

methods.name: generateNativeSetters
methods.description: Generates setter functions for array and map variables.
